column1: # Transaction Category Test Fixture - CSV Format
# Source: CardDemo System Migration - COBOL to Java Spring Boot
# This CSV test fixture provides comprehensive transaction category reference data
# for Spring Batch processing validation and testing scenarios. The data supports:
# - Category code validation testing (4-character numeric codes)
# - Category description validation and lookup table integration
# - Active/inactive status handling for business rule testing
# - PostgreSQL foreign key constraint testing with transaction data
# - Transaction categorization validation and classification scenarios
# - Spring Batch reference table processing and error handling
# - Invalid category codes for validation testing
# - Standard active categories for normal processing
# ACTIVE TRANSACTION CATEGORIES - Primary Test Data
# Based on source trancatg.txt with 4-character code conversion
# Categories that have been deactivated for testing business rules
# Categories designed to test boundary conditions and error handling

column2: Maximum length description for testing boundary conditions
